#include<stdlib.h>
#include<stdio.h>
int gcd(int a, int b) {
	return b ? gcd(b,a%b) : a;
}
int main() {
   int t,x1,x2,x3,x4;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t-->0) {
	    scanf("%d%d%d%d",&x1,&x2,&x3,&x4);
       int p = abs(x1-x3), q = abs(x2-x4);
       if (!p || !q) {
           printf("0\n");
           continue;
       }
       int r = gcd(p,q);
       p /= r;
       q /= r;
       //cout << (p+q-1)*r << endl;
       printf("%d\n",(p+q-1)*r);
   }
   return 0;
}
